## PBShaderExp class

Base class for a expression in the shader

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class PBShaderExp extends Proxiable<PBShaderExp> 
```
**Extends:** [Proxiable](doc/markdown/./device.proxiable.md)<!-- -->&lt;[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)<!-- -->&gt;
